A store repesents a company or a unique: A store repesents a company or a unique catalog of products. If your OMS is connected to multiple eCommerce stores sellling different collections of products, you may have multiple Product Stores set up in HotWax Commerce.

Discarding the re-count will revert the: Discarding the re-count will revert the count to the previous count value.

Hard counts are used when conducting lar: Hard counts are used when conducting large scale full counts at facilities. Products are not added to hard counts before they’re assigned. Facilities will count everything they have in stock. Anything they don’t count will defaulted to 0 on hand.
If a file includes multiple facilities,: If a file includes multiple facilities, a count is created for every facility. All items with no facility location will be added to the same count.
Item has been removed from the cycle cou: Item has been removed from the cycle count
Make sure all the columns are mapped cor: Make sure all the columns are mapped correctly.
Make sure you've reviewed the products a: Make sure you've reviewed the products and their counts before uploading them for review

Please provide a valid barcode identifie: Please provide a valid barcode identifier.
Please select at least one field to gene: Please select at least one field to generate CSV
No product found, please verify your CSV: No product found, please verify your CSV
Please select the column that correspond: Please select the column that corresponds to the product identifier
Products will not be deduplicated. Make: Products will not be deduplicated. Make sure products are only added to a count once.
Require inventory to be scanned when cou: Require inventory to be scanned when counting instead of manually entering values.{space} If the identifier is not found, the scan will default to using the internal name.
Saving recount will replace the existing: Saving recount will replace the existing count for item.

Scanned item does not match current prod: Scanned item does not match current product

Show the current physical quantity expec: Show the current physical quantity expected at locations while counting to help gauge inventory accuracy.

Something went wrong while login. Please: Something went wrong while login. Please contact administrator.
Specify which facility you want to opera: Specify which facility you want to operate from. Order, inventory and other configuration data will be specific to the facility you select.
The cycle counts file uploaded successfu: The cycle counts file uploaded successfully.
The inventory will be immediately update: The inventory will be immediately updated and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to update the inventory variance?
The products in the upload list will be: The products in the upload list will be removed.
The timezone you select is used to ensur: The timezone you select is used to ensure automations you schedule are always accurate to the time you select.
This is the name of the OMS you are conn: This is the name of the OMS you are connected to right now. Make sure that you are connected to the right instance before proceeding.
Updating a count will replace the existi: Updating a count will replace the existing count. The previous count cannot be restored after being replaced.
